question: A coil having 9 turns carrying a current produces magnetic field <katex>$B_1$</katex> at the centre. Now the coil is rewounded into 3 turns carrying same current. Then the magnetic field at the centre <katex>$B_2 =$</katex> ____
choices: <katex>$\frac{1}{3}B_1$</katex> (Duplicate option text, assume D is meant to be 3B or similar but source says A)
explanation: Length of wire <katex>$L = N_1 \times 2\pi R_1 = 9 \times 2\pi R_1$</katex>.
